page.title: 02SHOPS IN HANDCROSS
page.content: Handcross has one street of shops.The Greengrocer sells vegetables and milk. The sweet shop sells sweets and ice creams and it also has a tearoom.The paper shop sells news papers and sweets,ice creams and birthday cards. Glendale designs sell willow and cane furniture including bunkbeds,cupboards and children's furniture.The general hardware store sells bees wax, firelighters and pet food.There are two butchers.The first one sells all kinds of meat.His most popular meat is beef.He opens at 8.30 and closes at 5.30.The other butcher has been a butcher for 50 years.The post office is like a supermarket.It sells bread, cheese and frozen foods and has a small section set aside for the post office.
